argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | clmvsneg.b | |- B = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | clmvsneg.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 3 |  | clmvsneg.s | |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) |
| 4 |  | clmvsneg.n | |- N = ( invg ` W ) |
| 5 |  | clmvsneg.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 6 |  | clmvsneg.w | |- ( ph -> W e. CMod ) |
| 7 |  | clmvsneg.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 8 |  | clmvsneg.r | |- ( ph -> R e. K ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( invg ` F ) = ( invg ` F ) |
| 10 |  | #P_clmlmod | |- ( W e. CMod -> W e. LMod ) |
| 11 | 6, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 12 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 9, 11, 7, 8 | #P_lmodvsneg | |- ( ph -> ( N ` ( R .x. X ) ) = ( ( ( invg ` F ) ` R ) .x. X ) ) |
| 13 | 2, 5 | #P_clmneg | |- ( ( W e. CMod /\ R e. K ) -> -u R = ( ( invg ` F ) ` R ) ) |
| 14 | 6, 8, 13 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> -u R = ( ( invg ` F ) ` R ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ph -> ( -u R .x. X ) = ( ( ( invg ` F ) ` R ) .x. X ) ) |
| 16 | 12, 15 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ph -> ( N ` ( R .x. X ) ) = ( -u R .x. X ) ) |
